name: The Return Of The Doots
description:
The return of the doots is a wave game where you shoot skeletons, it is based from this one haha funni picture: 

The game is a fast paced action shooter in wich you have to survive waves of skeletons, the game has a bunch of difficulties and a custom night difficulty!

WARNING!: THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR FUN SO THERE IS PROBABLY BUGS ALSO THERE ARE SOME SECRETS! (ALSO THE GAME IS STILL W.I.P!)

Have fun 💀 and dont doot the spook!
